launchDialog.title: Welcome to the Beta version of the AoT app!
launchDialog.description1: This is a web application where you can find information about characters from the anime Attack on Titan (Shingeki no Kyojin), browse a collection of quotes and add them to your favourites.
launchDialog.description2: The app is under development, so bugs may occur. If you would like to report a bug or share your own ideas, you can contact the app's author on discord â€” lut3k.
launchDialog.description3: This page is a fan project and is not affiliated with the official creators or publishers of Attack on Titan.
